nodes.text: Mandalore the Conqueror was an individual who took up the title of Mandalore, the leader of the Mandalorian warrior culture, sometime between 7000 BBY and 3996 BBY. Mandalore oversaw a number of military campaigns that greatly expanded the resources and territory of the Mandalorians, establishing the Mandalorian Crusaders.

Mandalore the Conqueror was first mentioned in the 2011 novel The Old Republic: Revan, and received a further mention in the 2012 reference guide Star Wars: The Old Republic Encyclopedia, though neither identified Mandalore's species or gender.
